data.summary: Motivated and skilled software developer with a strong passion for the drone industry, AI, machine learning, and big data. With over 5 years of experience in various technology industries, including FinTech, E-Commerce, Ride-Hailing Apps, and Bots, I have a proven track record of quickly embedding in client teams, gathering requirements, and designing top-performing applications. I possess excellent problem-solving skills and a deep understanding of web development technologies. As an entry-level software developer at Fahari Aviation, I am excited to contribute to the development and enhancement of in-house applications.
